title: Display weighted revenue forecast dashboard by quarter
description: As a VP of Sales, I want to view a weighted revenue forecast dashboard broken down by quarter, so that I can predict revenue and make informed business decisions.

acceptanceCriteria.criterion: Given I access the forecast dashboard, when it loads, then I see current quarter and next 3 quarters forecast data
Given I view a quarterly forecast, when deals are in different stages, then the forecast is calculated using stage-based probability weights
Given I view the forecast, when I see the total, then it shows both weighted forecast and best-case scenario (100% probability)
Given I click on a forecast amount, when the detail view opens, then I see the list of deals contributing to that forecast

definitionOfDone.item: Dashboard UI with quarterly breakdown implemented
